caption: It was delivered fast and pizza was still hot. Great value with pizza and soda deals.
For the second time in a row, we brought our pizza home and found it had been burned.
my order got delivered on time.  Delivery guy was courteous
Make it to where people can buy your wing sauce in a bottle to take home for themselves
Best deep dish live had in this area. I truly Chicago Pizza Hut Love the pizza . The staff is great too and the manager is incredible at customer service!!
Pasta was burnt and very dried out.

I recently ordered 2 Detroit Pepperoni Pizzas online; I was called within a few minutes of my order and told these were no longer available. After a considerable wait, it was suggested I order to Pepperoni Pizzas... which were also an additional $8.00. I found these pizzas "doughy" and, to be honest, inedible. (Ate one, threw out the 2nd.) Kinda felt screwed over...

Simply amazing!! When I went, I had the pleasure of seeing the man, the myth, the legend, Dom behind the counter making pies! We had a large pie that was amazing, you can taste the quality of every ingredient coming together beautifully into one of the best slices of pizza you'll ever have in your life!
Wish they were open for lunch.
I love yall guys

I was extremely impressed with the Pizza Hut Team. The delivered my order in a timely fashion and during a snow storm that kept me from being able to pick up my food. I greatly appreciated their service.

It was one of the best we have received since we moved back to Chicago, 7-years now... Whoever made the order understands quality and the buttery crust was amazing like I remember from early Pizza Hut days. We saved it for day 2 to extend the pleasurable experience.
Delivery took SO long and they forgot to give the delivery driver part of our order :/ The order was suppose to take 60-70 min, but ended up being 115 minutes. Disappointing experience.
My pizza was ready on time and my order was correct.
good pizza
Great service
Room temperature
The Pizza Hut team had my pick up order ready on time and were friendly. Great service, thank you Pizza Hut team.
Thanks for the pizza
The food arrived quickly and was delicious and hot!
I would like if the Beyond Meat sausage was at every location.

I understand the contactless delivery system in place with the current pandemic but for my delivery driver to not even attempt to call me and let me know my food was delivered was unacceptable. On top of having my phone number right on the receipt I live in a high rise building with a doorman that the driver could have easily instructed to notify me my food had arrived. Instead I had to go down myself and check only to find my food had been sitting there for idk how long it was almost room temperature.
They gave me 3 wrong sodas. Also I would have preferred to use the free pizza coupon for a beyond pizza, especially when there is a $15 spending minimum anyway.

Terrible food for the first time at this location, must be a new employee cooking.  -breading on boneless wings torn off of the wings. -no sauce for the bread sticks. -barely any marinara sauce on the pizza.  I will no longer be going to any pizza hut in the future; family owned pizza places will probably have better quality food.
I felt the pizza was a little incomplete. But I love pizza, hut.
My order was correct.
It took two hours to be delivered, it was cold, the contact less delivery was not followed, the person called my phone instead of using my buzzer, basically everything failed.
Consistently good pizza, you know exactly what you're getting.
Easy to order, easy to pick up

I am so frustrated. I came here for a small visit and had to step off the property to comfort my grandmother in the hospital who is dying. They immediately booted my car and charged me $170 just to remove it. I will never go back to this business, as I can’t afford this ridiculous scam and may not afford my rent.

Staff was super friendly, but don’t walk across the street to binnies to get a drink for that za cause someone will boot your car, time lossed from getting the boot off will make your pizza cold and not as good. 3 minutes cost us 170 dollars.
Pizza!
quick serivice

This is been thrice in a row. Initial order when at store was served great. There after have ordered a pizza online through Mobile app for pickup. Since app doesn’t allow to order 2 sauces for 16 piece Boneless chicken, did phone in to store and place an order alongside of Garlic Parmesan sauce( I don’t want to comment on Customer service either via phone or in-person experience, in short they least worried about customer). Finally what I received is a Spicy Garlic sauce. For second time, for same order, Garlic sauce that goes along with boneless wings doesn’t have a sufficient amount of sauce that it should go with. Told the same but no difference. Today I order a large pizza (garlic buttery blend) with 3 toppings back plus a side of Boneless wings. But the base wasn’t a Garlic one instead it’s a plain one. I complained when placed 2nd Order but nothing is changed. But I gave a chance for 3rd time, another ignorance on the same line. So I don’t think will make a next visit in future. And I also recommend, if some thinks to place order, THINK twice.
Luis was super helpful with my order tonight and was extremely friendly! The pizza and bread sticks are always fresh and taste great! Thanks!
Worst service, I ordered my food at 6:12 and it’s already been an hour close to being 2 hours Makes me upset as well when the place isn’t that far from my work
Order a small pan personal pizza and wings and waited two HOURS. demanded my refund but they said no and got my food cold. Worst service ever.
Last night a cheese stick saved my life
Good but not great
Love the pizza
Great pizza! Very nice manager. Very vast.
Great place! Really nice manager. Very vast and great food.
Great customer service the lady was really nice

Slow. The last two nights we have cancelled our orders. Tonight we were told it’d be delivered at 5:55, called at 6:30 to be told it would be another hour because they were busy. The reviews are true, you’ll wait at least 2 and a half hours for your order, don’t even bother.
Love it
Ordered here a couple of times and the pizza was really good!
It was a awesome place to be

Waited an hour after I ordered my pizza to find out they can't deliver it because they dontd have a driver. No explanation, just nope to delivery. Apparently they only had one driver on a Thursday night.
Have given this place several chances. Unfortunately, one star is being extremely generous.

I ordered some food from this place and I only live like a half a mile away but first they charged me 5 times but I was fine with that because I could argue later due to only getting info for 1 order but I ordered food at 12:50 and it said it would arrive 1:25... it’s 2:30 and I still haven’t gotten it yet!

It's over an hour since my scheduled delivery time. I get that it can get busy and take extra time, so I called into the store to see what was happening. After landing straight on hold, the system hangs up after 10 minutes. I went through 3 cycles of this and still no response. This is the first problem I've encountered with this location, but after this experience I don't think I'll order again
The pizza was made in quick fashion and was pretty good!
Customer service is good

Horrible customer service. Our pizza was soggy and we tried to get a refund and they said they were going to give it to us and they pretty much lied about it. They really don't care about their customers. They need to retrain their whole staff. That is why Pizza Hut is a failing chain. They aren't really thinking about how to provide quality service to their customer.
The best pizza in chicago!!!
Ordered delivery at 1015. According to website they close at 12, but they "weren't taking any more delivery orders.

(Translated by Google) Excellent they brought us great, the guy who treated us that night gave us a pizza of courtesy, and made an effort to serve us in our language. Very sastifecho  (Original) Exelente nos trararon de maravilla, el chico que nos atendio esa noche nos regalo una pizza de cortesia, y se esforso para atendernos en nuestro idioma.muy sastifecho
Great cheap place
I ordered my pizza at 2:30pm today 4/22 and still haven't gotten it in over 3.5. hours. It's nearly 6:10pm now Still says it's being made online :/
Ok

My husband works here and they haven’t paid him it will be 2 pay periods starting tomorrow Im so stressed out because We about to get put out with our 3 children and they have no way of contacting anyone smh 🙏🏾
Employees refuse to answer phone 😠
Half the menu is unavailable. Spent a few minutes looking at what to order, ask for a medium, then he says they’re all out of medium and can only get a large.

Awful, awful awful! Cashier was beyond rude, he made an incorrect order and made me feel like I was the incorrect party,  he questioned my intelligence and competence. NEVER returning to this location EVER AGAIN!
Grab and go pizza place.

Absolutely worst pizza hut I've ever encountered.  I ordered boneless chicken wings and was sent cinnamon rolls.  They refused to take the 7.99 charge off for the wings I didn't receive.  They didn't offer to deliver them either.  I spent 1hr on Pizza Huts secondary complaint service ruining my entire night.  Now I still have to deal with talking to the district manager in a few days. They laughed when i said I was contacting Pizza Hut about being charged for wings and getting cinnamon rolls.  That's how awful this location is.

They don't bring your pizza when you order it, so that's not fun.  UPDATE - Driver showed up after two hours, I refused to pay, and he tried to punch me. So I guess if you want two-hour-old pizza with a side of punching, this is definitely the place to call.
Terrible service, terrible standards, stay away.  Go somewhere else to get pizza, even if it's just dominoes or whatever fast food pizza you can think of.

I would leave zero stars if I could. My pizza arrived with all of its toppings in the corner of the box as if the pizza had been turned on it's side or upside down. I called and spoke to a manager named Tim who refused to provide me a refund and told me to call the other manager Michael the next day during business hours. When I did that, Michael refused to provide a refund and said they can't provide refunds for orders placed  on other business days. Clearly this is a miscommunication on their end yet I am the one paying for it.  Absolutely terrible customer service. Both managers I spoke to were incredibly rude and childish. Will never order again and I suggest you don't either.
It bad

Terrible experience ordering from this store. Ordered delivery online, no update on their online tracker, waited an hour and 45 minutes, finally called the store to check in on the order and got hung up on by the manager. Twice. Don't waste your time.
I ordered a neat livers paid 39$ and this is what I got, I wanted to post a picture, it was ridiculous
Walked far in rain only to find out that they have no seats and I had to go somewhere else
Fast service, order was hot, fresh & correct!

I ordered in person with a kid at the front desk, Mike.  I came back to pick up my order and it was clear they put the wrong pizza in the oven and tried to hurry to put a new one in. That's fine, but they just completely ignored me, didn't tell me how much longer it'd be. They just avoided eye contact... Terrible customer service... Just tell me what happened and it'd be fine.  Trying to avoid me made the situation incredibly frustrating. Definitely won't be ordering from here again.
Very old oily and thick not recommended
I ordered pizza that was made incorrectly. When I called to get the right pizza delivered, the manager told me that I was lying, even after I offered to save the wrong pizza or show pictures.

Waited 1 Hour and 45mins for Pizza. Which would have been fine since that's how long it said it was going to take online, But the Pizza was barely warm and could not taste any sauce. So they probably had it in the car ride delivery for that long and it dried up. It's a scam that they lower pizza prices, but then make you order 20$ or more for delivery. Also you have to pay for Delivery fee,  plus driver tip. That 7.99 Pizza becomes 30$

I ordered small pasta but those are coming in large paper box. It doesn't fit in my backpack. I asked them plastic bag, or smaller bag but answer was no. Horrible experience. Unkind, very unpleasant experience. I don't recommend to go there.
By definition this is an above average rating. Only place in Chicago with stuffed crust pizza besides DiGiorno.

Never order from this place! I ordered from them online, and they not only got the order wrong, the pizza doesnt have enough cheese on it!! So disappointed with Pizza hut. My partner could barely eat a slice! :(
I work close by and order lunch from here. Never had a problem with them. The food is great and the service is fast.

Persons on the phone don't know what they're doing.  They seemed to not understand how to deliver to a local hotel that has been here longer than I've been alive.  Two people taking one order made things confusing.  Asked for regular hand tossed, was given pan, which apparently costs more.  They don't offer cheese dips.  Was given a verbal total of $21 in a heavy accent and was then charged $40 at the point of delivery, because "service fees and Chicago delivery."  Every step with this place was a chore and an excuse.  Could have walked down the street and had a three course meal for that price.  Order elsewhere.

5 stars for the pizza. One star for the front cashier. He Didnt tell me any specials didnt want to tell me any offers going on. Didnt explain any of the choices to choose from crust sauce topping exct....Not helpful horrible attitude. Should be fired if he doesnt care for customers.

(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza, I asked that they give me a hat and the manager wanted to give me his, very cool and attention  (Original) Excelente pizza, pedi que me regalen un gorro y el encargado me quiso dar el suyo, muy buena onda y atencion

I was give a credit for mis-delivering a pizza.  I specifically asked about expiry and they told me that I can call any time and order and use the credit. But today when I tried to order, the manager Micheal says that it expired and he cant do anything about it. BTW its just 1 week over 90 days, if I knew I would have ordered last week and he was hard on 90 days and said he cant do anything. If he needs to be so hard he needs to be hard on his employee who gave me the wrong information and not customer.
Great pizza just needs at least a table inside for those that want to way inside
Thrash naw thrash probably would’ve had more flavor a cheese pizza should’ve had cheese
Not much to say, the service was quick. The food was decent for a fast food joint.

***DO NOT GO***  This parking lot has incredibly aggressive "parking security" that lurk to boot your car instantly (like, within 30 seconds) and charge you $140 to get the boot off. Pizza Hut could have cared less.
Only takeaway place
Terrible service, bad food, and rude management.
Pizza tasted extremely salty & old. Normally pizza from here is delicious, just a bad experience tonight.
The best place for quick bites. The wait is 20 mins or less. They take cash and credit. They do not have a restroom or tables to dine in.
No good deals
Decent but not the best
Best pizza hut ever!!!!
It's about what you expect from a pizza hut
Nice
They have the worst delivery ever. Always takes at least 45 minutes to an hour more than the scheduled delivery. Never ordering again.
Ordered from here 3 times. Once they got it right. Once they forgot the pop and I forgave them. This time the pizza was 40 minutes late. I'm not mad, I'm just disappointed.
This restaurant consistently is unable to deliver on time.
Worst Pizza Hut I've ever been to :(
Order bbq wings had lots of feathers on wings! Won't order fr that store..

Ordered online.  Pizza, etc. arrived 45 minutes late and missing items.  I called the store. I was told by the manager that I was being given a credit for my next order, to be used by phone.  Figured all was resolved.  Ordered online a few days later -- because I was on the phone and knew I could use the phone credit another day.  Pizzas arrived on time.  But they were completely destroyed, as if somebody had juggled with the box.  I called the store. They sent new pizzas, and I gave them the destroyed pizzas back.  The new pizzas arrived, again destroyed -- and now almost 2 hours since I first ordered.  I called the store.  The manager wanted to give me another credit (for more than the cost of the pizza).  I agreed to take a credit, again, but only for the cost of the pizzas I ordered.  A couple weeks later:  Called by phone to order and use the credit. Guess what, there's no record of any credit.  And the shift manager isn't authorized to address the problem.  Wow.  My experience/opinion:  avoid this store, unless you want to get ripped off.
Ordered pizza from here twice now... My pizza showed up like someone took the box and kicked it down the Staircase at the Sears tower....

I have ordered 3 times twice delivery and they arrived on time with the exact order. Last time I picked up and everyone was very courteous and helpful! Great place and everyone was working like crazy because it was 9 pm peak on Friday but still they took time to make sure I was taken care of. 7 stars!
2+ hours to get delivery on more than one occasion
I've heard things
This place is trash
fast delivery
The pizza is really good, the problem with this place is they mess up your order.... A LOT. Check your pizza before leaving
Delivery took way way too long. What's the point of delivery if I could have gone to the grocery store, bought a pie, walked back home, and baked it all in the same amount of time? Terrible.
Th

Never ordering again from the PIzza Hut in Lakeview Chicago, WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!! They messed up the order, and then the manager wouldn't make it good and told me he didn't have to give me his name. THEN he hung up on me. Awful!! NEVER AGAIN! I complained through the pizza hut website and got an auto response apologizing for something that HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH WHAT I WROTE IN ABOUT. Auto responses are NOT good customer service!!!
Just ordered a medium pepperoni pizza and it arrived cold after an hour and forty minutes.  This seems to be the norm for this location.
It has taken over an hour to have pizza delivered on very off peak hours. It's actually pretty shocking how long it takes to get delivery. I wish them the best...
great service, fast deliveries, always before estimated time. try the large pepperoni stuff'd crust pizza too.

Good food, cheap price and convenient location. I've been to this location a few times now and the staff have been helpful. The one time I had a bad experience, the manager was more than helpful in attempting to correct the misunderstanding.
